title: johnsaributua
author: johnsaributua
content: I sold bitcoin last 2018 when it fell by almost $10,000/coin it made me fall. although today it looks bad too but it was better at that time. I'm sure the bitcoin price will come back like last year. I'm sorry for rejecting the reality and hiding. I forgot that there is nothing wrong with me starting as soon as possible. I want to know what is your attitude with the bitcoin price today?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Always know that it is never too late to buy bitcoin again. All-time-high was $69000, now at $22350. That is a huge drop and most likely bitcoin may stay at $20000 to $25000 for a while. If it falled below $20000, there would possibly be another correction back to $20000. What is likely more possible after a long time is people to awake to buying bitcoin. Bitcoin price will rise, this is one of the best time to just buy and hold.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: There is always a time to start anew. Most beginners who have invested with very little knowledge of the fluctuations in the market and possibly might have enmeshed with way much that they could afford to lose would make the mistake of selling like you did. I would have too but, thanks to my close attachment with the form that have tought me several lessons. Even if I were to sell and I still sell, it's surely going to be a slight portion that wouldn't matter much on the whole and I've always got plans of replenishing it when I have any cash to spare. Withdrawing from my holdings is more like taking a loan that needs refunds.

comments.author: Invester
comments.body: You are not alone. It was clear that many bitcoin investors sold cheap during 2018 because of fear. Now we have the chance to invest again before bitcoin reaches its old price and establish another all time high record. People are now smarter after their experiences. I started to buy little by little. I am doing the cost averaging slowly this time. The world is becoming difficult to understand and bitcoin is a great option. This is inevitable with the dollar and other currencies plummeting.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on September 13, 2022, 07:03:57 AMI want to know what is your attitude with the bitcoin price today? I don't feel anything again, neither do i have any attitude about it, what's there to have an attitude when you already know of its short term volatility, and you know you have to hold and if you can't, don't invest, because waiting for it to be a money making scheme for you will be much to your chagrin later on. Selling your bitcoin is not a terrible stuff, bitcoin is meant to be bought, sold and spent, you cannot hold for eternity, if you have sold you can surely buy again, and if you have never bought before, you can surely start buying now or anytime you are ready, everyone should do what works for them.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on September 13, 2022, 07:03:57 AMI sold bitcoin last 2018 when it fell by almost $10,000/coin it made me fall.For consolation, you are not the only one who sold it then, the only question is, did you do it fast enough so as not to be at a loss? The same thing is happening today because people are disappointed that Bitcoin did not reach the price of $100 000, and now they are waiting for some new opportunity in the hope that the price will go down even more. What is important is that people learn something from their past actions and not repeat the same mistakes, and if you think you made a mistake in 2018, then you have a new chance to correct it today. It's never too late for a new start, and if you look historically, Bitcoin has always been a very profitable investment - although only for those who understand what they're actually investing in.

As you've said, that it's better this time which I also think so there's no need for me to panic.I'll just do what I've started and that's to hold and accumulate.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I still hold Bitcoin until now because I see a bright future for Bitcoin, it's not about the price will increase, but the Bitcoin use case will be needed for many people and there's no other can replace it.IMO if you want to start accumulating Bitcoin, you need to learn and understand with security and safety first e.g. don't hold in custodial wallet, don't get phished or revealing your private key to fake site, don't click any random links etc.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: More than satisfied with the current price. although it fell further than last ATH, but this time bitcoin will be better for sure. The price of Bitcoin is still in the range of $20,000-$22,000 even though today there is a pretty hard slam for bitcoin.In 2018 I lost the moment to buy cheaper bitcoins, but for those who bought bitcoins for $3000 and held them until now of course can't hide anymore they are gradually selling them to take a profit.This time is a good opportunity to redo it all, buy and then hold it until it reaches a new ATH.do DCA and keep bitcoins well and see the next few years.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on September 13, 2022, 07:03:57 AMI want to know what is your attitude with the bitcoin price today? If you trust this cryptocurrency and believe bitcoin can make you a profit in the long term, then don't think too much, just make a decision and buy again. The huge price swings are all part of the process of unearthing speculators and separating investment wheat from chaff. The main point is that there will be cycles, and when the time is right for another bull run, bitcoin will again rise to become a highly profitable asset. So I think it's a good time to start again (this is my personal opinion, not financial advice).My personal belief is that the price will rise exponentially, but do not expect to get rich over night. If you want to invest in Bitcoin again, invest small amounts you can afford to loose, try not to go all in. Don't repeat your mistakes from the past.Never FOMO, don't sell your bitcoin when in loss and keep your cool!

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: No need to feel sorry for having fallen but we are now in a low value maybe 2018 and now 2022 are a little different but rest assured that the current bitcoin price ( 21k ) can be said to be lower than ATH before so if you want to start it's great but you should note that to be strong hold BTC as long as possible until the price returns to future highs.I think you are not alone in this case you have learned a lot from the experience, starting now is not only you but many now who have started holding bitcoin for the long term, but now do it with any technique you can to get started, if buying directly more difficult then do DCA it will be the best way for you.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on September 13, 2022, 07:03:57 AMI want to know what is your attitude with the bitcoin price today? Everyone has their own thoughts and attitudes about the current or future Bitcoin price, you have the right to hide and determine your own Bitcoin, I'm sure what you have experienced has also been experienced by Bitcoin users here, especially those involved in Bitcoin investment & trading.I also have a real understanding for Bitcoin today, if you talk about investing of course today is the best moment to think about and if you talk about trading this is also the best method you do, Bottom line: understand the risks of today's crypto market if you want to make big profits.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on September 13, 2022, 07:03:57 AM~You're all good, OP. Bitcoin managed to get way past 60k. It was also like those days when Musk was still popular in crypto. There is also nothing wrong in starting late. It is like regretting to invest in Bitcoin back in 2013 as well.For the attitude you ask, I am just "meh". Nothing to buy, nothing to sell. I am still keeping an eye on the price, but I do not let any sort of price fall/surge get into me.Just keep holding like usual, OP.I do not really care how long we're going to stay in 20k, it is just like how I did not care when Bitcoin fell back to 3-4k back around 2018-2019 (can't entirely remember what year).

comments.body: Quote from: Invester on September 13, 2022, 08:25:42 AMYou are not alone. It was clear that many bitcoin investors sold cheap during 2018 because of fear. There is a time for some dump and pump that we need to handle to be able to have profit in bitcoin. Many lose interest in bitcoin after 2018 dump since they didn’t think that bitcoin can still recover after it set another ATH, not knowingly there will be more influencers and big companies who became interested and gives hype again in bitcoin that set a much bigger ATH. The price dump is normal now due to different events happening in many countries as well knowing how high the price of bitcoin before it gets in this bear season. So starting again to accumulate some bitcoin to hold can be a good start to newbies or to any one who wants to enter in bitcoin again.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: I also sold some Bitcoin before because I’m already with my profit by that time and I don’t regret any beside I didn’t leave the market because I’m still here buying and selling Bitcoin if there’s an opportunity to make money. We all lose opportunities but that is not a good reason to give up, the future of Bitcoin is still here don’t ignore this opportunity again to buy Bitcoin, the price will surely rise again.
